meta.description: Discover JetCare™ solutions, specially designed for JetPeel™ hydroporation technology. High-quality skincare products with optimal results.

header.title: JetCare™ - Solutions
header.subtitle: Original JetCare™ solutions are developed to achieve optimal results with JetPeel™ hydroporation.

hero.description:
Original JetPeel™ solutions by TavTech.
Specially formulated for JetPeel™ hydroporation technology, JetCare™ solutions are perfectly matched to the unique delivery mechanism of the handpieces.

JetCare™ solutions are tailored with precise viscosity to withstand high pressure and speeds up to 720 km/h without losing their molecular integrity or effectiveness.

Only the combination of patented JetPeel™ handpieces and JetCare™ active ingredients enables deep hydroporation and consistently optimal treatment results.

Results are immediately visible and noticeable, and the effects of the solutions are long-lasting.

For the best results, a series of treatments is recommended, and to maintain the results, periodic treatments should be repeated as needed.

indications.title: Indications:
list: ✔ Aging, regenerating skin, wrinkles, loss of skin elasticity
✔ Impurities such as acne and blackheads
✔ Under-eye puffiness, eye lift, lip volume enhancement

sequence.title: Best anti-aging solutions with JetPeel
sequence.subtitle: JetPeel by TavTech – a complete combination of the JetPro device series, original patented JetPeel handpieces, and JetCare solutions.
